indexTranslate.CreatesAComprehensiveProfile: Creates a comprehensive profile showcasing skills, achievements, and stats.
indexTranslate.engageWithOtherUsers: Engage with other users, football clubs, and connect with scouts, managers, and coaches.
indexTranslate.impresses: Impresses your favorite club and receives an offer for a professional contract.
indexTranslate.accesses: Accesses the database of player profiles, reports, and performance analytics to discover emerging players.
indexTranslate.communicate: Communicate with players and other stakeholders through the platform's messaging system, providing feedback on their performance and discussing contract negotiations.
indexTranslate.finalize: Finalize contract offers and negotiate terms with potential recruits.

talentTranslate.discoveredByClub$Scouts: Get discovered by Clubs and Scouts from all around the world.
talentTranslate.engagesWithOtherUsers: Engages with other users, follows football clubs, and connects with scouts, managers, and coaches.
talentTranslate.receiveNotification: Receive notifications about opportunities for trials with clubs.
talentTranslate.impressesAClub: Impresses a club during a trial and receives an offer for a professional contract.
talentTranslate.detailedPersonalProfile: Create a detailed personal profile showcasing your skills, performance data, photos, videos, and statistics.
talentTranslate.favoritePhotos$Video: Showcase your favorite photos and video on your profile.
talentTranslate.connectAndCommunicate: Connect and communicate with other football talents, clubs and scounts to build your network and opportunities.
talentTranslate.enjoyAdditionalFeatures: Enjoy additional features and benefits with our premium membership, including exclusive content and advanced filtering options.
talentTranslate.theCompleteTalentProfile: The complete talent profile with all stages of his career and performance data.
talentTranslate.exportData: Export data in excel and pdf formats.
talentTranslate.bestPhotosAndVideos: Highlight your best photos and videos on your profile.
talentTranslate.clubsAndLeagues: Present your profile to clubs and leagues in other countries.
talentTranslate.hiredGlobally: Higher chances to get hired globally.
talentTranslate.searchResults: Jump to the top of search results.
talentTranslate.growYourNetwork: Profile boosts help you grow your network and following faster.
talentTranslate.specificAudience: You can boost your profile to reach a specific audience, such as Talents, Clubs or Scouts.

clubTranslate.filteringOptions: Browse a comprehensive database of football talents with detailed profiles and filtering options.
clubTranslate.profilesOfPlayers: View in-depth profiles of players, including statistics, achievements, and personal information.
clubTranslate.accessHighlightVideos: Access highlight videos and match reports to stay updated on player performances.
clubTranslate.connectWithClubs: Connect with clubs, scouts, and players from around the world for unique networking opportunities.
clubTranslate.careerAndPerformanceData: The complete talent profile with all stages of his career and performance data.
clubTranslate.exportDataInExcel: Export data in excel and pdf formats.
clubTranslate.bestPhotosAndVideos: Highlight your best photos and videos on your profile.
clubTranslate.clubsAndLeagues: Present your profile to clubs and leagues in other countries.
clubTranslate.hiredGlobally: Higher chances to get hired globally.

imprintTranslate.contentsOfOurPages: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or topicality of the contents. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages under the general laws. According to §§ 8 to 10 of the Telemedia Act (TMG), we are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to general laws remain unaffected.
imprintTranslate.ourWebsiteContainsLinks: Our website contains links to external websites. We have no influence on the content of these websites; therefore, we cannot assume any liability for their content. The respective providers or operators of the linked websites are always responsible for their content. At the time of linking, the linked websites were checked for possible legal violations. Illegal contents were not identifiable at the time of linking. Permanent monitoring of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation. Upon notification of violations, we will remove such links immediately.
imprintTranslate.contentAndWorks: The content and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, or any form of commercialization of such material beyond the scope of the copyright law shall require the prior written consent of its respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of these pages are permitted for private, non-commercial use only. Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon notification of violations, we will remove such content immediately.
imprintTranslate.usePersonalData: For information about how we collect and use personal data, please refer to our [Privacy Policy](link to privacy policy).
imprintTranslate.obligedToParticipate: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

privacyTranslate.committedToProtecting: At SoccerYou, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website and services.
privacyTranslate.personalInformation: Personal Information: When you register, we collect information such as your name, email address, date of birth, and location.
privacyTranslate.usageData: Usage Data: We gather data on how you interact with our website, including your IP address, browser type, and access times.
privacyTranslate.provideServices: To Provide Services: Your information helps us deliver the features and services you request.
privacyTranslate.improveOurServices: To Improve Our Services: We analyze usage data to improve our platform and user experience.
privacyTranslate.toCommunicate: To Communicate: We may use your information to send you updates, newsletters, and other communications.
privacyTranslate.rentYourPersonalInformation: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your data with trusted partners who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, provided those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
privacyTranslate.safetyPersonalInformation: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Your data is stored in secure environments and is accessible only to authorized personnel.
privacyTranslate.ourWebsiteCookies: Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your web browser (if you allow) that enables the site's or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information.
privacyTranslate.deleteYourPersonalInformation: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us here E-Mail.
privacyTranslate.updatePrivacyPolicy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you of significant changes via email or through our website.
privacyTranslate.questionsOrConcerns: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

termsTranslate.welcome: Welcome to SoccerYou. By using our website and services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
termsTranslate.accessingOrUsing: By accessing or using SoccerYou, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions and any applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our services.
termsTranslate.agreeToUse: You must be at least 13 years old to use SoccerYou. You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
termsTranslate.acessCertainFeatures: To access certain features, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
termsTranslate.solelyResponsible: You are solely responsible for the content you post on SoccerYou, including any text, images, or videos. You grant SoccerYou a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute your content in connection with our services.
termsTranslate.postOrTransmit: Post or transmit any harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content.
termsTranslate.impersonate: Impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity.
termsTranslate.interfereWithDisrupt: Interfere with or disrupt the security or functionality of our services.
termsTranslate.contentOnSoccerYou: All content on SoccerYou, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of SoccerYou or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from any content without our express written permission.
termsTranslate.reserveTheRight: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to SoccerYou at any time, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these terms or is harmful to other users of the platform.
termsTranslate.soccerYouIsProvided: SoccerYou is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties, express or implied, about the reliability, accuracy, or suitability of our services for any purpose. Your use of SoccerYou is at your own risk.
termsTranslate.directIndirect: In no event shall SoccerYou or its affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the services.
termsTranslate.conditionsAreGoverned: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country/State], without regard to its conflict of law principles. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in [Your Country/State] for any disputes arising out of or related to your use of SoccerYou.
termsTranslate.updateTimeToTime: We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you of significant changes via email or through our website.
termsTranslate.questionsOrConcerns: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

cookieTranslate.cookieToEnhance: At SoccerYou, we use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage them.
cookieTranslate.improveSiteFunctionality: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us remember your preferences, improve site functionality, and understand how you interact with our content.
cookieTranslate.essentialCookies: Essential Cookies: These are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic features such as page navigation and access to secure areas of the site.
cookieTranslate.performanceCookies: Performance Cookies: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, such as which pages you visit most often. This data helps us improve the site’s performance and user experience.
cookieTranslate.functionalityCookies: Functionality Cookies: These cookies remember your preferences and choices, such as language settings and login details, to provide a more personalized experience.
cookieTranslate.targetingCookies: Targeting Cookies: These cookies track your browsing habits to deliver relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.
cookieTranslate.personalization: Personalization: To remember your preferences and settings.
cookieTranslate.analytics: Analytics: To analyze website traffic and user behavior.
cookieTranslate.advertising: Advertising: To show you relevant ads based on your interests.
cookieTranslate.blockOrDeleteCookies: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. However, please note that disabling cookies may affect your experience on our website.
cookieTranslate.GoogleAnalytics: We may also use third-party cookies from service providers such as Google Analytics to help us understand how visitors use our site. These third-party cookies are subject to the privacy policies of their respective providers.
cookieTranslate.updateOurCookiePolicy: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you of significant updates through our website or email.
cookieTranslate.questionsOrConcerns: If you have any questions or concerns about these Cookie Policy, please contact us at:
